definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Jos 13:14 an offering made by fire (> Wetzst in De:Psalmen, ed. 4, 889 der. fr. √ II. [[אנשׁ]], means to friendly relations betw. God & man; cf. Lag:BN 190) Ex 29:18 + 32 t.; cstr. [[אִשֵּׁה]] Le 1:9 + 14 t.; pl. cstr. [[אִשֵּׁי]] Le 4:35 + 15 t.; sf. [[אִשַּׁי]] Nu 28:2, [[אִשָָּׁי]] Le 6:10; used chiefly of offerings of animals, but also of the [[מִנְחָה]] Le 2:11, and of the sacred bread and frankincense Le 24:7, Le 24:9 which was placed on the table as a memorial, and finally went to the priests. The word is used in De 18:1, Jos 13:14 (D) 1Sa 2:28; elsewhere in P Le 6:10, Le 10:15, Le 22:22, Nu 28:2, Nu 28:3, esp. in phrases [[אִשֵּׁי]] [[יהוה]] Le 2:3 + 11 t., [[אִשֵּׁה רֵיחַ נִיחׂחַ ליהוה]] Le 1:9 + 14 t., [[ריח ניחח אשׁה ליהוה]] Ex 29:18 + 6 t., [[אשׁה]] [[ליהוה ריח ניחח]] Le 23:13, [[אשׁה לריח ניחח]] Le 3:16, Nu 18:17, [[ליהוה]] ([[הוא]])[[אשׁה ]] Ex 29:25, Le 2:16; [[אִשֶּׁה ליהוה]] acc. after verbs of offering Ex 30:20 + 14 t., [[אִשֶּׁה]] [[עׂלָה ליהוה]] Nu 28:19, [[קָרְבָּן אִשֶּׁהליהוה]] Le 22:27, Nu 15:25.
